BoolChangeTrackerAdapter Class Reference

The BoolChangeTrackerAdapter keeps track of changes in ApproxsimBool objects. More...

Detailed Description

The BoolChangeTrackerAdapter keeps track of changes in ApproxsimBool objects.

Member Function Documentation

bool BoolChangeTrackerAdapter::changed (   )  const [virtual]
 

Checks if the DataObject this adapter adapts has changed since the last call to the toXML() function.

Returns:
True if the DataObject this adapter adapts has changed since the last call to the toXML() function, false otherwise.

Implements ChangeTrackerAdapter.

ostream & BoolChangeTrackerAdapter::toXML (  std::ostream &  o,
std::string  indent
)  [virtual]
 

Produces an XML representation of the changes in the object this adapter adapts according to the Approxsim xml schema. An indentation may be specified to increase readability.

Parameters:
o The ostream to write the XML representation to.
indent The whitespace indentation.
Returns:
The provided ostream with the XML representation written to it.
